commit.title: [errors] Don't raise inside exception printers
commit.message:
[errors] Don't raise inside exception printers

This is wrong and not properly handled anymore, instead the handlers
are expected to return the error message.

This is a backport of #11490 , as it turns out this doesn't make sense
in 8.11 neither.

Fixes #12291
